name: detox
description: Detox - A cross-platform library for Haxe to make working with Xml and the DOM easy... similar to jQuery and friends, but works wherever Haxe works, in a more haxe-like way.
releasenote: Use abstract for DOMNode. It wraps `js.html.Node` on Javascript, and `Xml` on other platforms. This is much cleaner than the previous typedef / conditional compilation solution.
